title: Mobile Learning-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Vocational Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and fundamental smartphone usage proficiency
context.additional_context: A project-based course for medical/legal/technical professionals to acquire practical mathematical competencies required in their work

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and solve real-world mathematical problems encountered in workplace scenarios using mobile devices.
Learners can develop and implement collaborative problem-solving strategies through PBL (Project-Based Learning) team activities.
Learners can self-directly establish and evaluate learning plans using mobile learning tools.

resources: Collaboration Tools (Online Whiteboard, Document Sharing System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
